block.p: ACKERMAN-Nathan. Of Great Neck, New York. Mechanical engineer, inventor, college adviser, on March 28, 1998. Beloved husband of Lillian, devoted father of Robin and Gary Fishberg, Heidi and Mervin Jordan, Glenn and Adina Ackerman, and Nathalie Ackerman, adored grandfather of Keith, Brett, Michele, Jonathan, Benjamin. Our thanks to all who have communicated their love and support. Service at Temple Emanuel of Great Neck, 150 Hicks Lane at 1 P.M. on Friday, April 3, 1998.
